text: Pedro Waldemar Manfredini (7 September 1935 – 21 January 2019) was an Argentine professional footballer. He played as a forward. He was born in Maipú, Argentina. Manfredini played for Racing Club, Roma, Brescia and for Venezia. In 1959, he played for the national team.
